title: Why can't I choose Teemo while in champion select?
body: I just logged in and wanted to try out a new build on Teemo {{champion:17}} , but while selecting I wasn't able to choose him.

replies.body: Teemo is currently disabled due to an issue with his passive.  Bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay updated!  Hopefully (unless you hate Teemo), our little yordle will be back in no time!
He's currently disabled due to a bug.
